author: Simon Difford
description: Stir the anis in with straws before drinking. Anis is best added last as it reacts on contact with ice.
name: Appleissimo
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
TOP with anis and serve with straws
